nodes.text: Sour Sarlacc was a non-alcoholic beverage served at Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The drink was suitable for human consumption and shared its name with the sarlacc species.

Sour Sarlacc is one of the non-alcoholic beverages that was sold to customers at the Ronto Roasters restaurant in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge upon the opening of the theme park in 2019. The beverage was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Minute Maid limeade, raspberry, spicy mango." At Disney's Hollywood Studios, the drink's base was later repurposed for an alcoholic version called Surly Sarlacc.
